article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky.
article.content:
U.S. Commercial Service: Exporters Wanted

The U.S. Commercial Service is the trade promotion arm of th​e U.S. Department of Commerce's International Trade Administration. With Export Assistance Centers in Lexington and Louisville, we are devoted to assisting small-to-medium sized Kentucky companies expand their international business presence. Our 1,800 trade professionals worldwide work in 107 different U.S. cities and overseas in 80 countries to serve your export interests. Please let the U.S. Commercial Service help your business prosper in today's global economy.​

Four Ways to Grow Your International Sales:

  • Consulting and Advocacy: Get personalized, expert help at every step of the export process
  • Market Research: Target the best markets with our world-class research
  • International Partners: Get personalized, expert help at every step of the export process
  • Trade Events: Promote your product or service to targeted, pre-screened buyers
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky.
